General.Name: Seven West Media Limited
General.Description: Seven West Media Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated media company, engages in the free to air television broadcasting and digital streaming in Australia and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Television; The West; and Other Business and New Ventures. It produces and operates commercial television programming and stations; and distributes programming content. The company also involved in the publishing of newspapers and insert magazines, colourpress, digital publishing, west Australian publishers, and community newspaper group. Seven West Media Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Perth, Australia.

5.Name: Mr. Robert  Cronin
5.Title: Editor-In-Chief & Editor of the West Australian
